import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import postService from '../services/post.service'; import Layout from "./LayoutComponent" const HomeComponent = () => { const [posts, setPosts] = useState(); useEffect(()=>{ postService.getAllPost().then((response)=>{ setPosts(response) }) }) const animals = ["Dog", "Bird", "Cat", "Mouse", "Horse", "asd", "asdasd", "Horse", "asd", "asdasd"]; return (
{posts ? posts.map(post => (
{post.owner}
{post.likes.length}
{post.owner} {post.description}
{/*
View all 14 comments
razzle_dazzle Dude! How cool! I went to New Zealand last summer and had a blast taking the tour! So much to see! Make sure you bring a good camera when you go!
*/}
)) :
asdasd
}
) } export default HomeComponent
